title: Mayur Haar Pendant - A Symphony of Tradition and Sparkle
materials: Natural Ruby accent. Features a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: This pendant showcases a graceful peacock (Mayur) motif intricately woven with diamond-studded floral vines. The peacock, a symbol of beauty and royalty, features delicate feather detailing. The piece also features a solitaire ruby. Below the peacock, a spherical golden bead adds a touch of playful elegance. The diamond setting accentuates the gold filigree work.
colors: Primarily yellow gold with brilliant white diamonds and a pop of vibrant red from the ruby.
occasions: or as a statement piece for a special night out. Its versatile design allows it to be paired with both traditional sarees and contemporary outfits.
description: This Mayur Haar Pendant is a modern heir apparent to traditional South Indian jewelry. The meticulously crafted peacock design, combined with the sparkle of diamonds and the richness of 22K gold, makes this piece a timeless treasure. The Hyderabadi polish ensures enduring luster. It's not just jewelry; it's a work of art and a symbol of elegance and prosperity.
